Guardians Arenâ€™t Above Prosecution Act of 2021
To amend title 18, United States Code, to punish the criminal offense of guardianship fraud, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary:
Guardians Aren't Above Prosecution Act of 2021
This bill specifies that individuals who are designated as a legal guardian or conservator are subject to federal criminal penalties for fraud.
